title: Packers fall to Eagles in defensive bout
content: If you're a fan of offense, Monday night in Green Bay was ugly. If defense is your thing, it was a thing of beauty.

title: Kelly files suit, says LSU seeking 'for cause' firing
content: In a legal filing Monday, Brian Kelly's attorneys say LSU has taken the position that it has not "formally terminated" Kelly as the Tigers' football coach and is now seeking to fire him "for cause" and potentially avoid paying his full $54 million buyout.

title: New Eagles LB Phillips 'showed out' in 10-7 win
content: A week after being traded from Miami to Philadelphia, new Eagles linebacker Jaelan Phillips played 52 snaps, racked up seven pressures, six tackles, two quarterback hits and a fumble recovery in his club's 10-7 win over the Packers on Monday night.

title: Love: Packers offense 'letting the defense down'
content: A strong effort from the Packers defense Monday night coincided with one of the worst offensive games in Jordan Love's three seasons as the starter, prompting the QB to remark, "You feel like as an offense you're letting the defense down."

title: 'Fire Nico' chants overshadow Flagg's career night
content: "Fire Nico!" chants -- a reference to embattled Mavericks GM Nico Harrison -- rang out in the fourth quarter in Dallas on Monday night, overshadowing No. 1 pick Cooper Flagg's season-high 26-point performance.

title: A's Kurtz, Braves' Baldwin named rookies of year
content: Athletics first baseman Nick Kurtz was selected the American League Rookie of the Year on Monday night after hitting 36 home runs with 98 RBIs in 117 games, while catcher Drake Baldwin of the Atlanta Braves took home the National League's top honors.

title: Pistons' Cunningham has 46 on 45 shots in OT win
content: Pistons star Cade Cunningham scored 46 points on 45 shots in a wild overtime win vs. the Wizards. His 31 misses were the most since the 1976-77 merger.

title: Heat steal OT win with buzzer-beating lob play
content: The Miami Heat sealed a thrilling 140-138 victory over the Cavaliers off a brilliantly designed out-of-bounds play that ended in an Andrew Wiggins alley-oop dunk.

title: McDermott backs Brady; not eyeing Daboll for staff
content: Bills coach Sean McDermott said Monday he was "fully confident" in offensive coordinator Joe Brady and his staff following a blowout loss to the Dolphins in Week 10.

title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
content: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 are collecting their hardware, starting with a pair of rookies from the A's and Braves.

title: Is UNC back?! Judging six opening week overreactions
content: From the strength of this freshman class to statement wins, these are conclusions we're drawing early.

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: UConn remains No. 1, USC climbs
content: The first in-season women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

title: What's at stake for every player in the WNBA labor battle
content: From stars with millions in off-court endorsements to those making the minimum, every WNBA player stands to gain in the new CBA.

title: Potential fatal flaws that could sink 26 playoff contenders
content: Can Ohio State run enough? Will Georgia's D show up? What could trip up Indiana? We look at the best teams' weak spots.

title: How Fleetwood Mac and the USC marching band went from a missed phone call to collaborating on 'Tusk'
content: The idea initially sounded so far-fetched band directors thought it was a prank. But the collaboration became a sensation.

title: What happens next in the Clase-Ortiz pitch-rigging indictments?
content: Breaking down the details of the indictments, what's next for those involved and what this means for the MLB.

title: Barnwell: The AFC is shifting, but the four new challengers to the conference throne are all flawed
content: We thought the Bills, Chiefs and Ravens would dominate the AFC again this season. But four teams have risen from the pack to challenge -- and possibly pass -- them.

title: Best, worst of NFL Week 10: Green Bay Packers lose to Philadelphia Eagles in defensive battle
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 10.

title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
content: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

title: Final in the United States? What the future holds for the UEFA Champions League
content: Are future Champions League finals here to stay in Europe or is there an impending future of Europe's most prestigious club game being played abroad?

title: MLS Cup playoffs Round 1 talking points: Messi, favorites move on
content: Were there any upsets in Round 1 of the MLS Cup playoffs? Not really, but that didn't mean the best-of-three series were short on drama.

title: NFL Week 10's top performance? Check the results of this week's 'Himmy' Award
content: TreVeyon Henderson, Matthew Stafford, DeMarcus Lawrence or Jonathan Taylor -- who earned Week 10's "Himmy" Award?

title: How No. 17 Kaeli Wynn fits at South Carolina, more 2026 girls' recruit projections
content: Breaking down the fits of every top 2026 commitment, including South Carolina's latest pick-up before the early signing window.

title: Early bets for Week 11: Bengals and Dolphins to cover, plus an MVP pick
content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are three early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: Norris continues to quiet his critics with title-worthy win in Brazil
content: Critics have long questioned Lando Norris' mental fortitude. His win in Brazil should shut them up, and put the F1 title within his reach.

title: Pickups: Memphis' Edey, OKC's Mitchell among top options
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Brighton's Minteh
content: Could Liverpool end up signing Yankuba Minteh from Brighton & Hove Albion? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Four inmates booked after video of dance party inside Bengaluru Central prison goes viral
content: On November 9, a video showing inmates dancing to loud music, banging plastic cans and plates as makeshift drums, and allegedly consuming liquor along with snacks, went viral on social media

title: Those responsible for Delhi blast will not be spared: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh
content: ‘I wish to assure my fellow citizens that the country's leading investigative agencies are conducting a swift and thorough inquiry into the incident,’ says Defence Minister

title: Native of Uttar Pradesh’s Amroha among 13 killed in Delhi Red Fort blast
content: Ashok Kumar was living with his family in a rented house at Jagatpuri, New Delhi, and worked as a conductor with the Delhi Transport Corporation (DTC) that provides bus services in the national capital, police said.

title: Nuapada Assembly bypoll: More than 32% voter turnout recorded till 11 a.m.; poll officer suspended
content: Polling has been continuing since 7 a.m. across all 358 booths, including 47 identified as sensitive, amid tight security arrangements

title: TMC MP Mahua Moitra criticises Amit Shah over Delhi Red Fort blast
content: India needs a capable Home Minister not a full-time Hate Campaign Minister, says TMC MP Mahua Moitra in a post on X

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: All responsible will be brought to justice, says PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister, who is in Bhutan today, said he was in a meeting with agencies and people involved in the blast's investigation overnight

title: Nithari killings: Supreme Court acquits prime accused Surendra Koli in last pending case, orders his release
content: The top court had earlier remarked that it would amount to a “travesty of justice” to uphold Sureder Koli’s conviction in the sole pending case

title: Two watchmen hacked to death at temple near Rajapalayam
content: Police suspect robbers attacked them when the watchmen resisted their attempt to steal from the temple hundial

title: Akola riots case: CJI-led Bench stays Supreme Court order to form SIT with equal Hindu, Muslim officers
content: Recently, a review filed by the State had led to a split opinion between Justice Kumar and Justice Satish Chandra Sharma, with the former upholding the direction while the latter changing his mind

title: Ghatsila Assembly bypoll: 54.08% turnout till 1 p.m.
content: While the JMM has put all its efforts into winning the bypoll and strengthening its credibility among the tribal masses, the Opposition BJP is trying to discredit the government by wresting the seat.

title: West Bengal Police bust ₹317-crore cyber fraud racket, conduct raids at businessman Pawan Ruia's premises
content: ‘A meticulous investigation unveiled the direct involvement of a cyber fraud. Over 1,379 complainants across West Bengal and other parts of India were cheated of approximately ₹317 crore,’ says police

title: Enhanced security put in place in Thiruvananthapuram airport
content: Passengers are advised to arrive ahead of their scheduled departure and cooperate with security personnel

title: Nuapada Assembly bypoll in Odisha records 14.99% voter turnout till 9 a.m.
content: Voting began at 7 a.m. in all 358 polling booths, including 47 sensitive ones, amid tight security arrangements

title: Tarn Taran Assembly bypoll: Over 36% voting turnout as of 1 p.m.
content: Voter turnout in the Tarn Taran Assembly bypoll reached 11% by 9 a.m. on November 11, 2025, as residents cast votes to fill the seat left vacant by AAP MLA Kashmir Singh Sohal’s death

title: Anta Assembly bypoll: Polling underway; 5.26% turnout till 9 a.m.
content: The bypoll, viewed as a prestige contest for both Chief Minister Bhajanlal Sharma and senior Congress leader Ashok Gehlot, is also the first electoral test for the BJP government since taking office last year

title: Bihar Assembly Polls 2025: Phase 2 constituencies and electors
content: The second and final phase of Bihar’s Assembly elections begins today. Here is a look at the constituencies going to polls and elector demographics.

title: Jammu and Kashmir bypolls: 9.36% turnout recorded till 9 a.m. in Budgam, 34.47% in Nagrota
content: Polling began at 7 a.m. in bone-chilling cold as the valley witnessed sub-zero night temperatures at most places

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: Pulwama doctor was occupant of car that exploded, forensic report awaited
content: Police have collected DNA samples and the forensic report on the nature of explosives used is awaited

title: SIR hearing LIVE: Supreme Court issues notice on SIR petitions; requests HCs to defer hearings
content: Several petitions have been filed including the one filed by DMK, CPI(M) and other political parties against EC's decisions to conduct SIR in various States including Bihar, West Bengal and Tamil Nadu

title: Polling for Dampa Assembly seat underway, 34.38% turnout recorded till 11 a.m.
content: The bypoll was necessitated following the death of incumbent MNF legislator Lalrintluanga Sailo in July.

title: Red Fort blast: Delhi Police detains vehicle's owner in Gurugram
content: The police have detained the car's owner, identified as Md Salman, in Haryana’s Gurugram. Salman had sold his car to a person in Okhla, the official said, adding that the car was registered in his name and had a Haryana registration number plate.

title: Watch: Red Fort blast: FIR filed under UAPA as cities placed on high alert
content: Delhi Police registered an FIR under the UAPA and Explosives Act after the car blast near the Red Fort on November 10 killed nine people. Following the explosion, major cities including Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Chandigarh were placed on high alert as security tightened nationwide.

title: Police verification for passports must be completed within four weeks: Allahabad HC
content: The court observed that the passport delay is a hurdle to the right to travel and that ‘any delay in such administrative functions should be strictly avoided unless justified by exceptional circumstances’

title: PM Modi arrives in Bhutan for two day visit
content: PM Modi was received at the Paro International Airport by Bhutanese Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay. “I join the entire nation in welcoming my elder brother, Prime Minister @narendramodi, to Bhutan,” PM Tobgay said in an X post

title: Accepting GST was a blunder, Centre taking away ‘all the money’, says Mamata
content: While the Chief Minister has accused the Centre of a “step-motherly” treatment and said that pending dues were not being released, this was the first time she has said that accepting GST was a “blunder”

title: What is the role of a pay commission? | Explained
content: How have public sector compensation systems evolved over decades? When was the first Central Pay Commission constituted? What are the different terms of reference? What are international practices? How can the government attract and retain talent?

title: Voting begins for bypolls to eight Assembly seats across six States, one Union Territory
content: By-elections are being held in Jammu and Kashmir’s Budgam and Nagrota, Rajasthan’s Anta, Jharkhand’s Ghatshila, Telangana’s Jubilee Hills, Punjab’s Tarn Taran, Mizoram’s Dampa, and Odisha’s Nuapada constituencies

title: Jubilee Hills Bypoll: 31.94% voter turnout till 1 p.m.; drones deployed for aerial surveillance of polling stations
content: The bypoll in the constituency no 61 of Telangana Legislative Assembly has been necessitated due to the death of Bharat Rashtra Samithi MLA Maganti Gopinath

title: Angola agreed to partner with India in ‘critical’ areas during President Murmu's visit: Official
content: He said the discussions reiterated the commitment to "encourage private sector...and private sector (was) playing a big and important role in advancing India, Angola ties of friendship and cooperation"

title: Bihar Assembly elections Phase 2 voting LIVE: State records voting turnout of 47.62% as of 1 p.m.
content: In the first phase of polling held for 121 constituencies in 18 districts on November 6, the State had recorded its highest voting percentage ever in history with 64.66% turnout

title: Fisherfolk want better facilities at crematoriums
content: At Odaikuppam near the Ashtalakshmi Temple in Besant Nagar, a resident said that the crematorium had no lights and did not have a proper burning shed

title: Deputy CM Udhayanidhi Stalin launches scheme to honour senior citizens on behalf of temples
content: Udhayanidhi Stalin also inaugurated 12 dwelling units constructed at a total cost of ₹3.40 crore meant for officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments (HR&CE) department.

title: J&K’s by-polls will be a verdict on Omar Abdullah government’s one-year tenure
content: The other factors working against Omar Abdullah in this election are also anti-incumbency and the opposition Peoples Democratic Party’s (PDP) deliberate bid to build its narrative around the government’s failure to deliver in the past one year

title: India airlifts 197 citizens who worked in Myanmar cybercrime hub from Thailand
content: The Indian embassy in Thailand said Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul came to Mae Sot to oversee the operation; Mr. Charnvirakul had expressed his government’s determination to stem the cyber fraud centres of Myanmar

title: Opinion: Opinion | Inside The 'Amendment' That May Make Asim Munir Pak's Supreme Authority
content: A constitutional amendment in Pakistan charters a new civil-military dynamic, heavily inclined to accommodate the whims, fancies, and megalomaniacal tendencies of one individual: General Asim Munir.

title: Delhi Car Blast Leaves Behind Trail Of Destruction. See Pictures
content: The high-intensity blast that ripped through a slow-moving car near Delhi's iconic Red Fort on Monday evening has left behind a trail of destruction.

title: Arrested UP Doctor Was Tasked With Setting Up Jaish's Women Wing In India
content: The Lucknow-based woman doctor, who was arrested in connection with the massive explosives haul in Faridabad near Delhi, was responsible for establishing the women's wing and recruitment for Pakistan-based terrorist group Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM), acco

title: US Teen, Who Caused Crash That Killed Indian-Origin Family, Jailed For 65 Years
content: A Texas teen has been sentenced to 65 years in prison for causing a crash that killed six members of an Indian-origin family in 2023.

title: China's Singles' Day Is A Shopping Festival. $202 Billion Sales Done In 2024
content: Originally a holiday to celebrate being single, as a counter to Valentine's Day, the event has grown into a weeks-long online shopping festival that this year began on October 9 and runs through November 11 - making it the longest Singles' Day sale.

title: Bihar Votes In Final Round Of Polling, 47.6% Turnout In Six Hours
content: The second phase of the assembly election in Bihar began this morning. Polling is being held on 122 assembly seats across multiple districts of the state. A chunk of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's cabinet is up for polls in this round.

title: Red Fort Blast Live Updates: Car Used By Suspected Delhi Suicide Bomber Was Bought, Sold 7 Times
content: Delhi Blast Live Updates: The blast near Red Fort, in which nine people died, is being probed as a terror attack, with the Delhi Police invoking UAPA (Unlawful Activities Prevention Act) sections.

title: Bihar Election 2025 Phase 2 Voting LIVE Updates: Nearing Half-Mark, Bihar Records 47.62% Turnout Till 1:00 PM
content: Voter enthusiasm continued to mark the second and final phase of the Bihar Assembly Elections, with an impressive 47.62% turnout recorded across the constituencies until 1:00 PM.

title: 5 Men, 5 Families And Shattered Dreams: The Many Victims Of Delhi Blast
content: The shocking blast near Delhi's iconic Red Fort, which shattered the national capital's peace and set off alarm bells in India's security establishment, turned the world upside down for nine families who lost their own and must now pick up the pieces

title: Man Charged With Killing Wife In UK Ran Shop In India Before Disappearing
content: UK police have travelled to India as part of their ongoing search for Pankaj Lamba, the man accused of killing his wife, Harshita Brella, in the UK last year.

title: "Act Of War": Government Sources Say "Op Sindoor On" After Delhi Blast
content: In a warning to perpetrators of the Delhi terror blast, government sources reiterated that any terror operation on Indian soil will be considered an act of war.

title: Musk's Tesla Cybertruck Executive Siddhant Awasthi Resigns After 8 Years
content: The executive leading Tesla's Cybertruck business is leaving the Elon Musk-led automaker after eight years.

title: Adani Group Enters Battery Energy Storage With India's Largest BESS Project
content: The Adani Group on Tuesday announced its foray into the Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) sector with a pioneering 1,126 MW/3,530 megawatt-hour (MWh) project which would be commissioned by March 2026.

title: 'Will Get To Root Of Conspiracy': PM Modi's Message From Bhutan On Delhi Blast
content: A powerful blast ripped through a slow-moving car at a traffic signal near Red Fort, killing nine people and leaving 20 others injured.

title: Mysterious Explosion To Anti-Terror Probe: How Pak Media Covered Delhi Blast
content: Several major Pakistani publications, including Dawn, Geo News, The Express Tribune, The News International, and Pakistan Today, featured the incident on their front pages and websites

title: Who Is Tariq Ahmad Malik, Suspect In Delhi Blast Case Arrested From J&K
content: A white Hyundai i20 car exploded near the Red Fort on Monday evening, killing at least nine people and injuring 20 others.

title: Nithari Killings: Surender Kohli To Walk Out Of Jail After Acquittal In Last Case
content: Surendra Koli, previously accused in the Nithari murder cases, will walk out of jail after the Supreme Court allowed his curative petition challenging his last conviction and death sentence.

title: Delhi Blast Linked To Faridabad's Jaish-e-Mohammed Module, Say Sources
content: Sources in the Delhi police said that the suspect, Umar Mohammad, the owner of the Hyundai i20 car used in the blast, panicked after his accomplices were arrested in joint security operations and carried out the attack.

title: "Those Responsible Won't Be Spared": Rajnath Singh's Warning After Delhi Blast
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh has said that they won't "spare" the people responsible for the blast near the iconic Red Fort in Delhi.

title: "He Never Left Kashmir": Family Of Man Accused Of Helping Delhi Suicide Bomber
content: Aamir and his brother, Umar Rashid (30), were arrested in connection with the case. Another accused, Tariq Malik (44), was also arrested.

title: Abhishek Banerjee extends support to same-sex couple who married in the Sundarbans
content: He has also promised development and support for the village and villagers who extended their support to the young couple who were abandoned by their families

title: Karnataka government to employ tech professionals at prevailing market wages to adapt to technological advances
content: As many as 39 highly skilled tech persons are to be hired for the new in-house Kaveri Technical Cell, which will pilot the future additions to the Kaveri console or even redevelop Kaveri software as per needs

title: Probing all angles: Home Minister Amit Shah on Delhi blast
content: “We are investigating from all angles. It is difficult to say what caused the incident,” Amit Shah said

title: Concern raised over proposed 50-MW wind farm near Greater Flamingo Sanctuary in Dhanushkodi
content: Both activists and local fishing community representatives have asked the Tamil Nadu Coastal Zone Management Authority to reconsider CRZ clearance for the project

title: India ready to become self-reliant, future-ready, globally influential by 2047: Abhay Karandikar, Secretary, Department of Science & Technology
content: India is the second largest deployer of 5G over IPv6 in the world and now has a vibrant 6G research ecosystem

title: Houses inundated in Kochi as KWA twin-chamber tank bursts
content: Compound walls collapsed and were washed away as the over four-decade-old tank breached, sending water gushing into nearby houses and damaging household equipment and vehicles; water supply to nearly 30% of areas within Corpn. affected

title: Weekend SIR drive a success as 3,05,780 voters in Ernakulam receive enumeration forms
content: A total of 6,27,009 forms have been distributed in the district till Nov. 9, accounting for 23.63% of the total voters

title: Red Fort blast | ‘Saw people being blown to pieces’: eyewitnesses recount trail of horror
content: Shoppers, taxi drivers and shopkeepers, who helped rescue the wounded and rush them to hospital, recall witnessing body parts and vehicle debris scattered around; our buildings shook, windows rattled, say Chandni Chowk’s residents; so severe was the impact that many felt it over a km away

title: Analysis of candidates of constituencies from Phase 2 of the Bihar Assembly Elections 2025
content: Out of 1,297 candidates analysed by the Association for Democratic Reforms, 415 candidates (32%) have declared criminal cases against themselves

title: Supreme Court refuses to entertain Amritpal Singh’s plea challenging his detention under NSA
content: Amritpal Singh, chief of the ‘Waris Punjab De’ outfit, is currently lodged in jail in Assam’s Dibrugarh along with his nine associates under the National Security Act

title: Rajnath Singh lauds Defence PSUs on acquiring Miniratna status
content: Munitions India Limited (MIL), Armoured Vehicles Nigam Limited (AVNL), India Optel Limited (IOL) and Hindustan Shipyard Limited (HSL) have been conferred with the status

title: Enduring spirit  of ‘Vande Mataram’ serves as a tonic to Indians, says A.P. Chief Minister
content: Claims the nation was proud to have successfully fought the British and for emerging as a global power under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi

title: Opposition demands probe into Red Fort blast
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge, Rashtriya Janata Dal leader Tejashwi Yadav, Samajwadi Party president Akhilesh Yadav and AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi are among the Opposition leaders who sought a ‘prompt and thorough investigation’ to ‘reassure the public with fair and transparent action’.

title: Madhya Pradesh Cabinet approves hike in Ladli Behna monthly allowance to ₹1,500
content: The increase of ₹250 in the monthly allowance of beneficiaries will cost the State an additional ₹1,793.75 crore for the ongoing financial year 2025-26

title: Final phase polling in 122 seats will decide the fate of 1,302 candidates
content: The final phase is crucial for Jitan Ram Manjhi’s HAM(S) and Upendra Kushwaha’s Rashtriya Lok Morcha (RLM), as these parties contest from their most number of constituencies in it. Besides the fate of 12 Nitish’s Ministers are also going to be decided in this phase. The Grand Alliance parties are involved in ‘friendly’ fights in 11 constituencies.

title: THtalksBengaluru: SoS buttons in aggregator apps to be linked to police command centre
content: ‘We have asked the aggregator apps to tweak their apps to ensure any passenger pressing an SoS button, it will send an alarm to our command centre as well’

title: Local body polls 2025: LDF bank on welfare record to extend 30-year grip over Nedumangad municipality
content: The UDF, which faces intra-party dissidence, is battling to regain lost ground. The BJP, which got two seats in 2010, has since maintained its presence, winning 4 seats each in the 2015, 2020 polls

title: Kerala police steps up security following Delhi blasts
content: Officials said the State police initiated the sweeping security exercise after preliminary investigation pointed to the possible involvement of terrorist groups; they said the police had initiated a high alert level not seen since the Easter Day Blasts in Colombo, Sri Lanka, in 2019

title: NDA is heading for historic victory in Bihar: BJP
content: Tejashwi Yadav is carrying forward his father’s legacy of corruption, misgovernance, and fear, the minister said

title: 2027 U.P. election decisive for saving democracy, says SP chief Akhilesh
content: It was the Samajwadi Party that had stopped the BJP’s growth in Uttar Pradesh; now, the party has the goal of forming a socialist government in 2027, he says

title: DME to take detailed statement of Venu’s wife
content: Venu died at the Thiruvananthapuram MCH while undergoing treatment for heart attack and his voice message alleging lack of medical care went viral

title: Bihar polls: NHRC issues notice to election officials over RJD’s viral election song with minors, promoting caste-based hatred
content: Officials have been asked to provide counselling to the children featured in the video, as well as to their parents or guardians, if required; an Action Taken Report also has been sought by the NHRC within two weeks for its perusal

title: Naveen Patnaik expresses strong displeasure over alleged violation of model code of conduct
content: Ruling party ministers, MLAs were not leaving Nuapada, where bypoll will be held on November 11, although they were legally mandated to do so 36 hours before election

title: J&K Police conduct large-scale crackdown in 10 districts; nearly 100 people detained
content: Jammu & Kashmir Police said the “objective of these operations was to trace and identify individuals involved in subversive activities, monitor suspicious movements, and ensure public safety and order”

title: Congress asks for thorough investigation into Red Fort blast
content: Congress President Kharge has urged the Centre to ensure a prompt investigation into the blast, especially given that it occurred in a high-security zone

title: Punjab, Haryana placed on high alert after Delhi blast
content: Police force has been deployed at sensitive and vulnerable spots, and checking of vehicles and suspicious people has been intensified, the Punjab Police said in a statement

title: Congress flags SIR concerns in Chhattisgarh
content: It says one-month deadline for document submission and verification not sufficient due to paddy harvesting season, demands a three-month window; Bastar-based leader voices concern over tribals lacking proper documents being left out

title: Delhi blast: Security stepped up at Chennai airport
content: Police teams comprising officers and personnel from the 12 police districts of Greater Chennai City are conducting intensive surveillance and vehicle checks at key locations, inspecting suspicious persons and vehicles as part of heightened security measures

title: High-powered panel formed to review functioning of Karnataka prisons
content: Home Minister Parameshwara announced that all prisons in the State would be linked to a central command center at the Prisons Headquarters to monitor CCTV footage in real time

title: THtalksBengaluru: Seemant Kumar Singh says employing agency to be held responsible if gig workers are found violating rules
content: The growing number of traffic violations and law and order cases involving delivery persons prompted the Bengaluru police to convene a meeting with food aggregators and firms employing gig workers. There have been close to 70,000 violations by them, he said.

title: THtalksBengaluru: Flagging vehicles for document check illegal; towing to be back
content: The Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA) will provide the police with towing vehicles, and towing will focus mainly on high density corridors

title: Revanth, Messi to kick off Hyderabad’s ‘GOAT’ moment in December
content: Proposed exhibition match likely to be scheduled on December 13, either at the Rajiv Gandhi stadium in Uppal or the Gachibowli stadium

title: Expert panel to look into woman’s death of post-delivery sepsis at SAT
content: Health dept. constitutes panel after the woman’s family, who alleged that she contracted the infection from the hospital, sought an inquiry by an external medical body. SAT has denied the possibility of her getting infected at the hospital

title: We need to create conditions for real, sustainable change: Sri Lankan PM
content: ‘We have been very responsive to governance, we have allowed people to process what we are trying to do, and if there is resistance, we have adjusted,’ says Harini Amarasuriya.

title: Police across Telangana put on high alert after Red Fort blast in Delhi
content: All city police commissioners and district Superintendents of Police were alerted and instructed to deploy Blue Colts and other field units to maintain heightened vigilance

title: ‘Orbit Wallet’ to power ‘smart commuting’ in Electronics City in Bengaluru
content: The card integrates transport, shopping, and digital payments into a single platform, offering employees a convenient and tech-driven solution for daily commutes

title: LDF announces candidates for Thiruvananthapuram Corporation polls; Mayor Arya Rajendran not in the fray
content: Candidates for 93 wards declared; eight to be announced later. The CPI(M) will contest in 70 wards, while CPI will field candidates in 17 wards. Thirteen candidates are under the age of 30, while 12 are below 40

title: GRAP 3 activated in Delhi-NCR: Know what’s banned and what’s allowed amid 'severe' pollution
content: Delhi's air quality has plunged to 'severe', triggering Stage III of the Graded Response Action Plan. This means a halt on most construction, a ban on older vehicles, and restrictions on industries. Essential projects are exempt if dust control is maintained. Younger students will shift to online classes, while the Metro adds services to encourage public transport use.

title: Delhi blast: Red Fort closed for 3 days; Lal Quila Metro, Chandni Chowk shut
content: Delhi remains on high alert after a powerful explosion near the Red Fort killed eight and injured 24. Key areas, including the Red Fort and Lal Qila Metro Station, are closed for investigation. The car involved was traced to Pulwama, and police are examining CCTV footage and conducting raids.

title: ‘What’s this’: Elon Musk’s query on Lord Ganesha; shares 'Hidden attachment'
content: Elon Musk showcased a Grok AI interaction. The chatbot identified a brass statue of Lord Ganesha. Grok detailed the deity's features and significance. This demonstration highlights xAI's advanced image recognition and cultural understanding. The AI's capabilities in identifying religious iconography were evident. This event underscores Grok's growing utility.

title: ‘Dharmendra is recovering’: Sunny Deol’s team clarifies
content: After a brief stint in the hospital, veteran actor Dharmendra found himself at the center of unfounded death rumors flooding social media. His wife, the iconic Hema Malini, swiftly dismissed these claims, referring to them as deeply hurtful. Dharmendra's team has reassured everyone that he is on the mend, much to the relief of his loving family and dedicated fans.

title: 'Urgent help needed': Sumit Nagal's visa plea to China
content: India's top tennis player, Sumit Nagal, has publicly appealed to Chinese authorities after his visa for the Australian Open Asia-Pacific Wildcard Play-off in Chengdu was reportedly rejected without explanation. The 28-year-old tagged the Chinese Ambassador and Embassy spokesperson on X, seeking urgent intervention for his participation in the crucial tournament.

title: Microsoft AI CEO warns: Calls Meta’s AI risky; says ‘not going to be good’
content: Microsoft's AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, is prioritizing human control over raw superintelligence, emphasizing that advanced AI must serve humanity's future.  Breaking free from OpenAI's previous limitations, Microsoft is now pursuing a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical breakthroughs and personalized education.  Suleyman acknowledges the immense challenge of controlling increasingly intelligent systems, admitting no easy answers exist.  While this path may be costlier, Microsoft is committed to a long-term vision of AI designed solely to benefit humankind.

title: IND vs SA: Security beefed up at Eden Gardens after Delhi car blast
content: Following a fatal blast near Delhi, security has been significantly heightened across Kolkata and at Eden Gardens for the India-South Africa Test. A three-tier security cordon is in place at the stadium, with intensified checks and plainclothes officers deployed. Key city zones and team hotels are also under enhanced surveillance, prompting a review of crowd management plans.

title: Delhi car blast: New video surfaces showing explosion near Red Fort area; watch
content: A devastating car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort metro station, captured on CCTV, has claimed at least 12 lives and injured many. Authorities suspect a Kashmiri doctor, Mohammad Umar, linked to a terror module, drove the vehicle. Police are investigating the incident under UAPA, reviewing footage to track the suspect's movements.

title: ‘Don’t have notifications’: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, despite leading a massive bank, limits his phone use at work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts unless from his children. He prioritizes focus in meetings, believing distractions hinder engagement. Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: Viral moment: Lionel Messi photobombs couple's romantic dance in Barcelona - watch
content: A couple's romantic video in Barcelona took an unexpected turn when football legend Lionel Messi casually walked into the frame. This viral moment occurred just hours after Messi's emotional visit to Camp Nou, his former home, fueling fan speculation about a potential return to his boyhood club.

title: 'Will dig deep into roots of conspiracy': PM Modi's warning from Bhutan after Delhi blast
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, speaking from Bhutan, expressed deep sorrow over the Delhi car blast and vowed that those responsible will be brought to justice. He assured that agencies are investigating the conspiracy and will get to the bottom of it. Defence minister Rajnath Singh also extended condolences and promised swift and thorough action, assuring the nation that perpetrators will not be spared.

title: ‘Envy and greed walk…’: Did Buffett take a dig at Musk’s $1 trillion pay package?
content: Warren Buffett subtly criticized soaring CEO pay, citing a 'race' fueled by envy and greed, particularly after Tesla's $1 trillion package for Elon Musk and Rivian's similarly structured offer for RJ Scaringe.

title: Dharmendra-Hema's unusual marriage, blended family: Why Hema chose not to live with Dharmendra
content: Bollywood's iconic couple Dharmendra and Hema Malini's love story defied societal norms. Married in 1980, Hema chose to live separately from Dharmendra, who was already married, prioritizing her happiness and dignity. Their unconventional union, despite public scrutiny, endured, showcasing a unique blend of love and acceptance.

title: Faridabad terror bust: Was Al-Falah University's lab used for making RDX?
content: A major counterterrorism operation has busted a transnational terror module. The arrest of a Kashmiri medical professor led to the seizure of nearly 2,900kg of explosives and weapons. Investigators uncovered a network embedded in academic and professional circles. The module was allegedly linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind. Several arrests have been made across multiple states.

title: MLB trade rumors: Blue Jays eye $450 million Cubs All-Star to boost rotation
content: Toronto Blue Jays are reportedly eyeing a blockbuster offseason acquisition of four-time All-Star outfielder Kyle Tucker.  Sources suggest Toronto could be the 'perfect fit' for the highly-rated talent, who is expected to command a massive contract.  This potential move aims to bolster the Blue Jays' already potent lineup and propel them towards championship contention.

title: 'Aap jld se jld apne ghar aye': Esha Deol, Hema Malini dismiss Dharmendra death news; fans relived
content: Bollywood's 'He-Man' Dharmendra was admitted to the hospital, leading to widespread false death reports. His family, including Hema Malini and Esha Deol, refuted the rumors, confirming he is stable and recovering. Fans expressed relief and sent prayers for his speedy return home.

title: Red Fort car blast: Security tightened in Delhi; are schools open or shut?
content: A powerful car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort metro station on November 10, 2025, claimed lives and injured many. Despite the incident, most Delhi schools and colleges continued normal operations on November 11. Authorities implemented enhanced security across the city. Some private schools offered online classes as a precaution. Schools in Noida and Ghaziabad remained closed due to pollution.

title: WTC race heats up: India eye crucial home points; South Africa arrive for two-Test battle
content: India and South Africa, both past WTC finalists, are set to clash in a crucial two-Test series starting November 14. With points vital for the 2025-27 WTC cycle, India, currently third, face a tough challenge against fourth-placed South Africa. This series is a key step for both teams aiming for a spot in the 2027 Lord's final.

title: 'Wild': Australian senator says he just discovered 'Indian poop throwing festival'
content: After claiming that he came under vicious online attacks from tens of thousands of Indian who targeted his family, American influencer Tyler Oliveira released the documentary on Karnataka village Gorehabba or cow dung festival misrepresenting it as "poop festival". Now an Australian senator commented that it's crazy that he discovered this thing about India.

title: Ctrl + Alt + DELhi: Worsening pollution crisis has soured love story with capital
content: Delhi's worsening air pollution is forcing residents to make difficult life choices, with many relocating to cleaner cities like Bengaluru. The choking smog is impacting health, prompting families to leave and professionals to time work trips away from the city. While some can escape, many are left hoping for government intervention to fix the crisis.

title: Kolkata auto driver molests woman during ride, follows her home
content: A 30-year-old woman was allegedly molested by an auto driver, Nirmal Chettri, during a journey in Kolkata. The driver reportedly followed her home after she jumped from the auto when he drove into an alley. Residents apprehended Chettri, who is now in police custody.

title: Red Fort blast: 7 unanswered questions as human body parts, vehicle debris scatter across 25m
content: A powerful blast outside Red Fort metro station plunged the area into chaos, with eyewitnesses describing deafening noise, flying car parts, and widespread panic.  The explosion shattered windows and left debris scattered, causing hundreds to flee. Amidst the destruction, brave individuals rushed to aid the injured, while many searched frantically for loved ones.

title: First visuals of suspect: CCTV shows man driving car that exploded near Red Fort
content: A devastating explosion rocked Delhi near the Red Fort, claiming nine lives and injuring over 20. A white Hyundai i20, reportedly driven by an absconding suspect, detonated at a busy traffic signal, igniting multiple vehicles. Authorities are investigating potential links to a foiled terror plot, with security heightened nationwide.

title: 'He's recovering': Esha Deol quashes Dharmendra death rumours
content: Dharmendra is admitted to Breach candy hospital. On Tuesday morning, reports of his demise flooded the social media, more so, after defence minister Rajnath Singh's tweet. However, Esha Deol has slammed these reports, confirming that her father is table.

title: India's new era: 'We don't think about averages or SRs' - Gambhir reveals blueprint
content: Head coach Gautam Gambhir emphasises impact over statistics in India's T20 resurgence, advocating for a fearless and flexible batting order beyond the openers. This dynamic approach, he believes, keeps the team ahead of evolving T20 trends. Gambhir stressed that individual brilliance is valued, but series losses should never be celebrated.

title: Emotional breakdown! 'Crowd gaaliyan de raha tha': Azam Khan's tale of abuses, tears
content: Despite featuring in 14 T20Is between 2021 and 2024, Azam Khan failed to register a single half-century and often drew criticism for his fitness and fielding, leading to his exclusion after Pakistan’s disappointing 2024 T20 World Cup campaign. Azam’s time with the national side was marked by inconsistent performances and questions over his wicketkeeping.

title: TBSE Tripura Board exams 2026: Date sheet released for class 10, 12; check complete schedule here
content: The Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) has announced the 2025 Class 10 and 12 board exam schedules. Class 12 exams run from February 25 to March 30, while Class 10 exams are from February 26 to March 24. Practical exams for both will take place from November 17 to December 1, 2024.

title: 'Will deepen bonds of friendship': PM Modi leaves for Bhutan; embarks on two-day visit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is on a two-day state visit to Bhutan's Thimphu to attend the 70th birthday celebrations of the fourth king. He will hold discussions with the current King, the former King, and the Prime Minister, aiming to deepen friendship and strengthen shared progress. The visit also includes the inauguration of the Punatsangchhu-II hydropower project, a key element of their energy partnership.

title: ‘Recced Delhi, waiting for Pak signal’: Gujarat ATS busts terror module planning attack
content: Gujarat ATS arrested three individuals planning nationwide terror attacks, uncovering chilling links to Pakistani handlers. One doctor was found with castor beans, poised to create deadly ricin, awaiting instructions. Two others conducted reconnaissance in Kashmir post-Pahalgam attack, identifying potential targets for future strikes. Investigations reveal online radicalization and drone-delivered arms.

title: Gold price prediction: What's the outlook? Top-level investors should watch out for
content: Gold price prediction: Gold prices are surging on hopes of US Federal Reserve rate cuts and continued buying by China. Analysts advise buying on dips rather than chasing the rally.  Key factors influencing gold include inflation concerns and the potential end of the US government shutdown.

title: IND vs SA: 'He's playing well, but …': Ganguly weighs in on Dhruv Jurel's Test selection
content: Sourav Ganguly acknowledged Dhruv Jurel's impressive form but noted the challenge of breaking into India's settled Test lineup. He highlighted the competition for the number three spot, with Jurel vying against other in-form players. Ganguly also backed India as favourites at home due to their strong spin attack and recent performances.

title: 'India have stopped doing it': Donald Trump repeats Russian oil claim
content: President Trump stated India has reduced Russian oil imports and indicated tariffs on New Delhi will be lowered. This follows earlier claims by Trump that Prime Minister Modi pledged to wind down Russian oil purchases, though India has denied awareness of such a call.

title: 'Can’t celebrate a series loss': Gautam Gambhir's honest admission
content: India clinched a consolation win in the third ODI in Sydney, thanks to a commanding 168-run stand between Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli — a performance that drew widespread applause from fans and pundits alike. Rohit Sharma remained unbeaten on 121 off 125 balls, while Virat Kohli scored 74 not out off 81 deliveries, guiding India to a successful chase of 237 runs in 38.3 overs.

title: CCTV footage shows Delhi blast suspect’s vehicle entering and exiting Red Fort area
content: In a tragic turn of events, a powerful blast shattered the calm of Delhi's Subhash Marg close to the historic Red Fort on Monday evening. The explosion, which emanated from a Hyundai i20 parked at a traffic signal, resulted in the loss of at least eight lives and left many others injured.

title: November 11, 2025: Best time today, as per zodiac sign
content: November 11, 2025, is a significant day in Hindu astrology, marked by Masik Krishna Janmashtami. Astrologer Vishal Bhardwaj highlights this auspicious time for various zodiac signs, offering specific windows for activities ranging from new ventures and financial matters to personal growth and relationships, aligning actions with cosmic energies for success and peace.

title: Rohit turns into romantic DJ! Plays 'aaj mere yaar ki shaadi hai' for wedding couple - watch
content: Recently, Rohit Sharma was the standout performer in the ODI series against Australia, finishing as the highest run-scorer with 202 runs in three matches at an impressive average of 101.00, including a century and a half-century. All eyes will now be on Rohit as India take on South Africa in the ODI series starting November 30 in Ranchi, followed by matches in Raipur (Dec 3) and Visakhapatnam (Dec 6).

content: Notre Dame and Pittsburgh will start at noon ET, in a showdown of ranked opponents . Pitt has been the no. 11 passing offense since turning to Mason Heintschel at QB . in the big Ten, Iowa travels to face USC, while the SEC will feature Oklahoma - Alabama and Georgia .

title: Overreactions: Taylor to break multiple records? Commanders' season over?
content: he rushed for 244 yards and three touchdowns in the 31-25 victory over the Falcons . a week after he had just 45 yards on 14 carries for his worst game of the season . his team's worst game was the scrimmage game, with just over six minutes left .

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: Houston, Purdue, UConn lead way
content: Purdue entered the season as the no. 1 team over Houston and Florida . the reigning champion Gators fell seven spots to no. 10 . a full week of 2025-26 men's college basketball season is in the books .

title: Why did the Giants fire head coach Brian Daboll? What's next?
content: the new york Giants are sitting at 2-8 for the third consecutive season . it's the second time this season the Giants blew at least a 10-point lead with under four minutes remaining . daboll is out with an 11-33 record over the past three seasons .

title: 🏈 College Football Power Ranks: 3 newcomers
content: Texas Tech is a legit threat for the college football playoff . but each squad has areas that can be sharpened for the stretch run . even teams much higher in the rankings, such as Oregon and Vanderbilt , came away from narrow wins with areas to clean up .

title: Free agent pickups: Key additions to fuel your playoff hunt
content: the 10th Sunday of the season began with an exciting overtime affair in Germany . in the late afternoon, the Los Angeles Rams QB Matthew Stafford tossed four TD passes for a record third consecutive game . the team is still waiting for WR Garrett Wilson and Chicago Bears WR DJ Moore to score a fantasy point .

title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
content: the 2025-26 season is just three weeks old, and there are more than six months until the start of free agency . the court should not dissuade us from identifying 12 potential free agents who have stood out and what their future could hold with their respective teams . there are criteria to how we selected our lineup of contract-year All-Stars .

title: NWSL: Gotham FC dumps KC Current; Spirit advance
content: the semifinalists are the last four league champions: the Orlando Pride , NJ/NY Gotham FC , Portland Thorns and Washington Spirit . the league that practically trademarked chaos outdid itself with two stoppage-time equalizers, three extra-time matches and an upset of the best team in league history .
